Texts.Chs: 自从我们的实验开始以来，已经过去了十四个周期，在这段时间里，这个样本不仅繁衍了下来，而且还通过受害者疼痛中枢的寄生虫感染而产下了幼崽。在后代中没有变异再次出现。实验442成功。
Texts.Eng: Fourteen cycles have passed since our experiment began, and in that time the specimen has not only thrived, but has taken to birthing young via parasitic infection in the pain-center of victims. No mutagen has resurfaced in subsequent generations. Experiment 442 successful.

Texts.Chs: 552号实验对象没有变异原的迹象。技师沃克斯拉尔建议，把这种样本放到某个地方的本地种群中，以观察它是如何在一个新的生态系统中茁壮成长或死亡的。我附议，而亚塔克渴望。第442号实验于黎明时分开始。
Texts.Eng: Subject 552 has exibited no signs of the mutagen. Artificer Voxlaar recommends releasing the specimen into a native population somewhere in order to observe how it thrives or perishes in a new ecosystem. I have seconded, and Yattak has thirded. Experiment 442 begins at dawn.
